short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes ads from the Badoo site. All information on the replenishment of their account, gifts and so on is removed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes ads from the Badoo site. All information on the replenishment of their account, gifts and so on is removed.
